Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds immense value to us at $8,000, but considering its importance to you, I believe it's only fair to present it to you at an exclusive introductory price. For this limited time, you can acquire the product for $7,200. It's a fantastic opportunity to own something truly exceptional at a special rate. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
